Text: Can anyone verify this? Afterall, it's "Anonymous"...

I can verify, because I'm the one who converted the audiobook :). I shared it with a friend who posted this torrent.  I used wondershare media converter. I'm hoping somebody can comment on the quality, as I'm no audiophile :). the book itself is outstanding IMO. I can do more books if people like the quality.
Ok, so far we have "Anonymous" and @oohlah [who has no torrents]...

This is true :)  but we all gotta start somewhere right?  ive been buying audiobooks for years, and finally bought one that i coudn't find anywhere on here. With all the press surrounding the book, i thought i could finally give back to this community. i only have my word, that this is legit with no issues. but i do understand the skepticism regarding the torrent.
oh yeah, regarding the specifics to the audiobook, its sample rate is 44100hz, 2 channel stereo, and bit rate of 128kbps.
